overview: It's never a good idea to get in a car with a stranger, but when the hitchhiker is a young, hot lesbian, the risk is worth the reward. Fasten your seatbelts as four adventurous young girls hitch rides with hot and horny older women, and watch them drive off course and straight into your erotic lesbian fantasies. Starring Devon Lee, Chastity Lynn, Dana Vespoli, Adrianna Sephora, Jelena Jensen and Jennifer Best. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Hitchhiking Lesbians
